name: ZayZoon APEX Middleware
description: This app allows APEX Bureaus to restrict ZayZoon API access.

AUTHORIZED_IPS.description: A list of ZayZoon IP Addresses separated by commas.

AUTHORIZED_CLIENT_IDS.description: A list of APEX Client IDs ZayZoon is authorized to access. Separated by commas.

ZAYZOON_API_KEY.description: API Key for ZayZoon to access the middlware.
